de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Scanline32Greyscale

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Scanline32
      • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Scanline32Greyscale

  • public class Scanline32Greyscale
extends Scanline32
    Scanline32 implementation for greyscale color types 0 or 5.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public void write(byte[] abSrc,
                  int nSrcIdx,
                  int nOffsX,
                  int nStepX,
                  int nLine)
        Description copied from class: Scanline32
        Writes a scanline to the current bitmap.
        Specified by:
        write in class Scanline32
        Parameters:
        abSrc - A source byte array containing the color/greyscale components to write.
        nSrcIdx - An int containing the start index in the source byte array.
        nOffsX - An int containing the offset where to start writing.
        nStepX - An int containing the step width per pixel.
        nLine - An int containing the line number to write.

      • read

        public void read(byte[] abDest,
                 int nDestIdx,
                 int nOffsX,
                 int nStepX,
                 int nLine)
        Description copied from class: Scanline32
        Reads a scanline from the current bitmap.
        Specified by:
        read in class Scanline32
        Parameters:
        abDest - A destination byte array which receives the color/greyscale components.
        nDestIdx - An int containing the start index in the destination byte array.
        nOffsX - An int containing the offset where to start reading.
        nStepX - An int containing the step width per pixel.
        nLine - An int containing the line number to read.

      • setTransparency

        public void setTransparency(PngTransparency tRNS)
        Description copied from class: Scanline32
        Sets the transparency chunk (tRNS) for the color types 0, 2 and 3. In case of indexed color (type 3) this is a table in conjunction with the PngPalette chunk (PLTE). In case of truecolor (type 2) and greyscale (type 0) this is a color sample with a byte length of 6 or 2.
        Specified by:
        setTransparency in class Scanline32
        Parameters:
        tRNS - A PngTransparency object.

      • nearestGrey4Index

        static int nearestGrey4Index(int nX)
        Find the nearest index in the GREY4 array above.
        Parameters:
        nX - An int containing a luminance or alpha value.
        Returns:
        An int containing the nearest index of a value in the GREY4 array above.

      • rgbToLuminosity

        static int rgbToLuminosity(int nRGB)
        Converts an RGB color into grey.
        Parameters:
        nRGB - An int containing an RGB value in it's lower three bytes.
        Returns:
        An int with the greyscale value in the lowest byte.
